name: Kevin
description: He loves people and loves the attention. likes to go out for long walks and is good on the lead. Rex is great!

name: Charlie
description: Charlie is good on the lead and loves to go out for walks. He needs a leader who teaches him the basic rules.

name: Denise
description: She is one of the most loving dogs, when she see’s you she comes over & hugs you. A total compasionate animal.

name: Jamie
description: This very kind dog is Jamie. He was left at the shelter gates. He is 5 years and 7 months old. He is very friendly.
